articles.content: The Australian share market has ended the day higher helped by good housing data and Chinese factory figures, but investors remain worried about rising coronavirus cases and the risk of a contested U… [+5300 chars]

articles.author: Giles Parkinson
articles.title: South Australia signs supply deal for Playford big battery and Cultana solar farm - RenewEconomy
articles.description: South Australia signs new electricity supply deal with Garnaut’s Zen Energy, and for the Cultana solar farm and Playford big battery.
articles.content: The South Australia state government has signed a new 10-year supply deal for its electricity needs that will pave the way for the construction of the Playford big battery near Port Augusta and the s… [+5155 chars]
